title: Mad Bad Spinning Top
description: Imagine a scenario of spy-masters out of control, rampant terrorism and a plot that takes you right into the world of spies, espionage, computer hacking and nefarious dealings. This book takes you from London to Istanbul, Ankara, the Black Sea and a surprising final destinationNothing seems to go well for the central character 'Chez', he always finds himself embroiled in a quagmire of dire circumstances. Corrupt Russian scientists, Turkish Military Intelligence, fanatical Turkish ultra-nationalists claiming to be the remaining descendants of the Amazon Women Warriors, the beautiful daughter of a Turkish General, and a crazy gung-ho CIA agent, set the scene that pulls Chez deep into a chain of events resembling one of his fictional hero's (Danny Rome) mad-cap adventures.
author: Richard Cheesmar
